nodes.text: Fusion weapons were weapons carried by a criminal known as the "Marauder of Endor".

Fusion weapons were mentioned in a one-page wanted poster, written by Bob Carrau for the 1993 book Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a publication that collects concept designs and photographs from various George Lucas projects. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
